General.Name: Korea Ind
General.Description: Korea Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells nutritional feed for laying hen, broiler, pig, dairy, cattle, duck, rabbit, black goat, sheep dog, and others. The company was founded in 1957 and is based in Busan, South Korea.

1.Name: Yeong-gyo  Kim
1.Title: Chief Exec. Officer, Pres and Representative Director
